articles.author: TAMEEM AKHGAR Associated Press
articles.title: Taliban attack Afghan forces in country's north, killing 14
articles.description: An Afghan official says the Taliban staged a predawn attack on a pro-government militia compound in the country's north, killing 14 members of the Afghan security forces
articles.content:
KABUL, Afghanistan -- 
The Taliban targeted a pro-government militia compound in northern Afghanistan before dawn on Monday, killing 14 members of the Afghan security forces, a local official. The Taliban quickly claimed responsibility for the attack.

articles.title: Cyprus court: British teen guilty of fabricating rape claims
articles.description: The woman claimed she was gang raped by 12 Israeli men.
articles.content:
PARALIMNI, Cyprus -- 
A Cyprus court on Monday found a 19 year-old British woman guilty of fabricating claims that she was gang raped by 12 Israeli men.

articles.title: As robots take over warehousing, workers pushed to adapt
articles.description: Robots haven't replaced warehouse workers yet, but they're here — and they need some human supervision
articles.content:
NORTH HAVEN, Conn. -- 
Robots haven't replaced warehouse workers yet, but they're here and they need some human supervision.
